titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse laying open the Beast, and his marks. Vpon the 14. of the Reuelations, vers. 9.10.11. By Richard Sheldon, a conuert from out of Babylon. Doctor in Diuinitie, His Maiesties chaplaine.
titleStmt.author: Sheldon, Richard, d. 1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-Crosse Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
